A4.text: The text does not mention French immigrants settling in Texas at Matagorda Bay, Galveston Island, or Chambers County. The only French-related settlement mentioned is the French Colony of Magdeburg in Saxony, Germany, not Texas.

A5.text: The text does not mention French immigrants settling in Texas at Galveston Island. The only French-related settlement mentioned is the French Colony of Magdeburg in Saxony, Germany, not Texas.

A6.text: The text does not mention French immigrants settling in Texas at Chambers County. The only French-related settlement mentioned is the French Colony of Magdeburg in Saxony, Germany, not Texas.

A7.text: The text does not mention French immigrants settling in Texas in 1685. The only French-related settlement mentioned is the French Colony of Magdeburg in Saxony, Germany, not Texas, and the year 1685 is referenced as the year of the text, not a location in Texas.
